cards.cardText: Once per game, you may draw 3 cards.
cards.flavorText: 'Ron had already had a big argument with Dean Thomas, who shared their dormitory, about football.'

cards.cardText: During your turn, you may use an Action and discard a card from your hand to look at your opponent's hand. You may then choose 1 card in his or her hand and discard it.
cards.flavorText: 'You don't want to go making friends with the wrong sort. I can help you there.' - Draco Malfoy

cards.cardText: During your turn, you may use an Action and discard a card from your hand to look at your opponent's hand. You may then choose 1 card in his or her hand and discard it.
cards.flavorText: 'You don't want to go making friends with the wrong sort. I can help you there.' - Draco Malfoy

cards.cardText: During your turn, you may use an Action and discard a card from your hand to look at your opponent's hand. You may then choose 1 card in his or her hand and discard it.
cards.flavorText: 'You don't want to go making friends with the wrong sort. I can help you there.' - Draco Malfoy

cardText.effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 1 damage.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 3 of his or her Lessons in play and discards them.
cardText.reward: Your opponent draws 3 cards or does 3 damage to you.

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 16 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.
cards.flavorText: 'The Stone... produces the Elixir of Life, which will make the drinker immortal.'

cardText.effect: Before each of your opponent's turns, he or she chooses a card in his or her hand (if any) and discards it.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions. (Those Actions don't have to be one right after the other.)

cards.flavorText: 'The ratting cart seemed to know its own way, because Griphook wasn't steering.'

cards.cardText: Once per game, you may trade 2 cards in your hand for 2 non-Healing cards in your discard pile.
cards.flavorText: 'The table on the right cheered and clapped as Hannah went to sit down at the Hufflepuff table.'

cards.cardText: Whenever you use an Action to draw a card, you may draw 2 cards instead of 1.
cards.flavorText: 'There will be books written about Harry â€” every child in our world will know his name!' - Professor McGonagall

cards.cardText: If you already have 2 or more Lessons in play, then whenever you use an Action to play a Lesson card, you may play 2 Lesson cards instead of 1.
cards.flavorText: 'She had a bossy a sort of voice, lots of bushy brown hair and rather large front teeth.'

cards.cardText: If you already have 2 or more Lessons in play, then whenever you use an Action to play a Lesson card, you may play 2 Lesson cards instead of 1.
cards.flavorText: 'She had a bossy a sort of voice, lots of bushy brown hair and rather large front teeth.'

cards.cardText: If you already have 2 or more Lessons in play, then whenever you use an Action to play a Lesson card, you may play 2 Lesson cards instead of 1.
cards.flavorText: 'She had a bossy a sort of voice, lots of bushy brown hair and rather large front teeth.'

cardText.effect: During each of your opponent's turns, he or she can play cards only if you played 1 or more cards on your previous turn.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent chooses and discards 1 of his or her Characters in play (other than his or her starting character) or 8 cards from their hand.

cards.cardText: Once during each of your opponent's turns, you may prevent all damage done by a Spell card.
Once per game, you may search your deck. When you do, you may take up to 2 Item cards from your deck, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: 'His whole head swung off his neck and fell on his shoulder as if it was on a hinge.'

cards.cardText: Your opponent discards his or her hand.
cards.flavorText: 'The Memory Charm'

cards.cardText: Once per game, you may trade 2 cards in your hand for 1 card in your discard pile that needs Charms power.
cards.flavorText: 'Professor Flitwick, the Charms teacher, was a tiny little wizard who had to stand on a pile of books to see over his desk.'

cards.cardText: Once per game, you may shuffle up to 7 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.
cards.flavorText: 'His eyes were black like Hagrid's, but they had none of Hagrid's warmth. They were cold and empty and made you think of dark tunnels.'

cards.cardText: Whenever you play a Character card, you use up 1 Action to play it instead of 2.
cards.flavorText: 'I'm the sixth in our family to go to Hogwarts. You could say I've got a lot to live up to.' - Ron Weasley

cards.cardText: Whenever 1 of your Creatures does 3 or more damage to your opponent, it does 2 more damage than it usually would.
cards.flavorText: 'Hagrid's beard twitched and they could tell he was smiling.'

cardText.effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 2 damage.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 7 cards in his or her hand and discards them.

cards.flavorText: 'The shouting and the echoes seemed to be driving the troll berserk.'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. You get 1 more Action on each of your turns (including the turn you play Unicorn).
cards.flavorText: ''That is because it is a monstrous thing, to slay a unicorn,' said Firenze.'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. Before each of your turns, draw a card.
cards.flavorText: '...and there was an owl rapping its claw on the window, a newspaper held in its beak.'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 12 damage to your opponent or to a creature of your choice.
cards.flavorText: 'What would I get if I added powdered root of asphodel to an infusion of wormwood?' - Professor Severus Snape

cardText.effect: Your opponent's Creature and Spell cards need 2 more Power to play.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 7 cards in his or her hand and discards them.
cardText.reward: Your opponent may put a Lesson card from his or her discard pile into play.

cards.cardText: Look at your opponent's hand. Discard all Adventure cards from it.
cards.flavorText: 'Easily the most boring lesson was History of Magic...'

cards.cardText: Count the number of Charms Lessons you have in play, Do that much damage to a Creature of your choice.
To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 10 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

cardText.effect: Your opponent plays with his or her hand face up.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent discards his or her hand. (Your opponent may do this even if his or her hand is empty.)
cardText.reward: You play with your hand face up for the rest of the game.

cards.flavorText: Never', said Hagrid irritably, 'try an' get a straight answer out of a centaur. Ruddy star-gazers.'
'And then they heard it - a low grunting and the shuffling footfalls of gigantic feet.'

cards.cardText: Your opponent plays with his or her hand face up.
To play this card, discard 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.
cards.flavorText: 'They slipped back down the spiral staircase, their hearts as light as their hands, now that Norbert was of was off them.'

cards.cardText: Play this card only is you have cards in play that provide at least 3 Charms Power. If you play this card, and you already have a Wand in play, discard the old one.
To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play. You get 2 more Actions this turn.
cards.flavorText: '...walk straight at the barrier between platforms nine and ten. Don't stop and don't be scared you'll crash into it...' - Molly Weasley

cards.cardText: When a Spell card damages you, you may discard this card from play to prevent all of that damage.
If your opponent has 2 or more Creatures in play, choose 1 of them and discard it.
During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you.

Do 3 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice. Then your opponent chooses 3 cards in his or her hand and discards them. (If there are fewer than 3 cards in your opponent's hand, he or she discards them all.)
Discard all creatures from play (even your own).
If your opponent has 2 or more Creatures in play, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards the rest. Then, if you have 2 or more Creatures in play, choose 1 of them and discard the rest.

cardText.effect: Your opponent can't play Spell cards.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 6 cards in his or her hand and discards them.
cardText.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

cards.flavorText: 'Harry was used to spiders, because the cupboard under the stairs was full of them, and that was where he slept.'

cards.cardText: Search your deck. You may take up to 2 Lesson cards from your deck, show them to your opponent, and put them in your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
To play this card, discard 2 other cards from your hand. You may take a card that needs Potions Power from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Discard the Adventure your opponent has played. (You don't get the reward.)
To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.
cards.flavorText: ''Hagrid,' said Hermione, 'how fast do Norwegian Ridgebacks grow, exactly?''

cards.cardText: Do 4 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
cards.flavorText: 'Bright blue flames shot from her wand...'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 10 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.
During your turn, you may discard this card from play and use an Action to choose a Creature in play (yours or your opponent's) and return it to it's owner's hand.
Your opponent chooses 2 cards in his or her hand and discards them (1 if he or she only has 1).

cardText.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to draw cards.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 7 Actions. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)
cardText.reward: Your opponent may draw any number of cards.

cards.flavorText: 'There were shops selling robes, shops selling telescopes and strange silver instruments Harry had never seen before...'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 8 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
Discard the Adventure you've played. You get the reward.
Play this card only if you have cards in play that provide at least 2 Charms Power. If you play this card, and you already have a Wand in play, discard the old one.
Do 2 damage to each Creature (even your own).

cards.flavorText: 'He let them in, struggling to keep a hold on the collar of an enourmous black boarhound.'

cardText.effect: Your opponent can't play Item cards.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 4 Item cards in his or her hand and discards them.
cardText.reward: Your opponent may search his or her deck for any card and put it into his or her hand. Then your opponent shuffles his or her deck.

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creature Lessons from play. Whenever a Spell card damages you, you may let Kelpie take that damage instead.
cards.flavorText: 'The mountains around the school became icy grey and the lake like chilled steel.'

cards.cardText: Discard the Adventure your opponent has played. You get the reward.
cards.flavorText: 'Hermione let out a great sigh and Harry, amazed, saw that she was smiling...'

cards.cardText: Search your deck. You may take a Creature card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: ''But what are you going to do with it when it's hatched?' said Hermione.'

cards.cardText: Remove all damage counters from all of your Creatures.
cards.flavorText: 'Isn't he beautiful?' Hagrid murmured.

cards.cardText: Put an Item card from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.flavorText: '...it's really the wand that chooses the wizard,...' - Mr Ollivander

cardText.effect: Whenever your opponent draws 1 or more cards, he or she then takes 1 damage.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)

cards.flavorText: 'There was a pop and a little man with wicked dark eyes and a wide mouth appeared, floating cross-legged in the air, clutching the walking sticks.'

cards.cardText: Whenever a Spell card damages you, you may let Pet Toad take that damage instead.
cards.flavorText: ''Don't know why he's so bothered,' said Ron. 'If I'd brought a toad I'd lose it as quick as I could.''

cards.cardText: Put up to 3 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck (in any order). Then draw a card.
cards.flavorText: 'Madam Pomfrey came over at that moment...'

cards.cardText: Your opponent chooses 3 of his or her cards in play and discards them (if your opponent has fewer than 3 cards in play he or she discards them all). Your opponent may prevent this by discarding 1 of his or her Potions Lessons in play and discarding it.

cardText.effect: Your opponent can't use more than 1 Action to play Lesson cards during each of his or her turns.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 4 of his or her Lessons in play and discards them.
cardText.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

cards.flavorText: 'It gave Harry a look that said quite plainly: 'I get that all the time.''

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 2 of your Potions Lessons from play.
Next turn, whenever your opponent draws a card, he or she discards it instead of putting it into his or her hand.
Do 5 damage to your opponent.
cards.flavorText: 'I arrived in time to prevent that...' - Albus Dumbledore

cards.cardText: Your opponent chooses 1 of his or her Creatures in play and discards it.
To play this card, discard 1 of your Creatures from play. Search your deck. You may take a Creature card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it in your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cardText.condition: Play this card only if your opponent has any Creatures in play.
cardText.effect: Your opponent can't use more than 1 Action to play Lesson cards during each of his or her turns.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 4 of his or her Lessons in play and discards them.
cardText.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

cards.flavorText: 'It's hatching.' - note from Hagrid

cards.cardText: Play this card only if your opponent has any Lessons in play. Choose 1 of those Lessons and discard it. Search your deck. You may take a Creature card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it in your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Once during each of your turns, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play. Prevent all damage done by that creature until the end of your opponent's next turn.
Put up to 2 Lesson cards from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.flavorText: 'The Summoning Charm'

cards.cardText: Do 1 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice. Then draw a card.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Transfiguration Lessons in play and discard it.

cards.flavorText: 'Brazil, here I come... Thanks, amigo.' - The Snake

cards.cardText: Put up to 4 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck (in any order).
Once during each of your turns, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play. Prevent all damage done by that creature until the end of your opponent's next turn.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Potions Lessons in play and discard it.
During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you by your opponent's Adventures and Creatures.
cards.flavorText: 'Slipping and stumbling, they followed...'

cards.cardText: Choose 1 of your opponent's Charms Lessons in play and discard it.
Do 1 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
Choose a Creature in play and return it to its owner's hand.
cards.flavorText: 'In the few seconds' silence, the dog growled and twitched, but the moment Hermione began to play, it fell back into its deep sleep.'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.
cards.flavorText: 'It was holding a huge wooden club, which dragged along the floor because the arms were so long.'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't play cards.
cards.flavorText: 'Snape made them all nervous, breathing down their necks while they tried to remember how to make a Forgetfulness Potion.'

cards.cardText: Do 2 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
cards.flavorText: 'Barrels of slimy stuff stood on the floor, jars of herbs, dried roots and bright powders lined the walls, bundles of feathers, strings of fangs and snarled claws hung from the ceiling.'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.
cards.flavorText: 'The boy lifted the lid of a box in his arms and the people around him shriekedand yelled as something inside poked out a long, hairy leg.'

cards.cardText: Put a Creature card from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.flavorText: '...yeh get a lot o' funny folk in the Hog's Head -- that's the pub down in the village... I never saw his face, he kept his hood up.' - Rubeus Hagrid

cards.cardText: Put up to 2 Lesson cards from your hand into play.
cards.flavorText: 'It was really lucky that Harry now had Hermione as a friend. He didn't know how he'd have got through all his homework without her...'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Shuffle up to 8 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.
Look at your opponent's hand. Choose 1 of those cards and discard it.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures in play and discard it.
cards.flavorText: ''I'm glad we didnt have to fight that one,' Harry whispered, as they stepped carefully over one of it's massive legs.'

cards.cardText: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items or Lessons in play and discard it.
Do 3 damage to your opponent.
To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 5 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
cards.flavorText: '...the delicate power of liquids that creep through human veins, bewitching the mind, ensnaring the senses...' - Professor Severus Snape

cards.cardText: Look at your opponent's hand. Discard all Creature cards from it.
cards.flavorText: 'In a matter of seconds, though, he was wide-eyed as Harry began to tell him and Hermione what had happened in the Forest.'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.
cards.flavorText: 'His name's Scabbers and he's useless, he hardly ever wakes up.' - Ron Weasley

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play.
To play this card, discard 3 of your Potions Lessons from play. Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures or Items in play and discard it.
cards.flavorText: 'You are here to learn the subtle science and exact art of potion-making'...' - Professor Severus Snape

cards.cardText: During your turn, you may use an Action to put a Lesson card from your discard pile into play.
During your turn, you may use an Action to put a Lesson card from your discard pile into play.
cards.flavorText: 'These were the books containing powerful Dark Magic never taught at Hogwarts...'
'... the path became almost impossible to follow because the trees were so thick.'

cards.cardText: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Your opponent may prevent this damage by showing you a Potions Lesson from his or her hand.
cards.flavorText: ''I don't know, sir,' said Harry. Snape's lips curled into a sneer.'

cards.cardText: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items in play and discard it.
All your creatures do damage to your opponent.

cards.flavorText: 'When Harry knocked they heard a frantic scrabbling from inside and several booming barks.'

cards.cardText: Do 2 damage to your opponent. You may also choose a Creature and do 2 damage to it.
Do 3 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you by your opponent's Creatures.
cards.flavorText: 'The club flew suddenly out of the troll's hand, rose high, high up into the air...'

cards.cardText: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Lesson card, put it into play. If it isn't, put the card in your hand.
cards.flavorText: 'Harry pulled a wizard cracker with Fred and it didn't just bang, it went off with a blast like a cannon...'
